goals.active: Acquire a power source for the Infinity Ball from the Inquest.
goals.complete: Shodd and I managed to obtain the power source we need from the Inquest, but the plan did not go off without a hitch...in fact, like all of Shodd's plans so far, this one was decidedly hitch-heavy. As we accomplished our mission, however, we decided to press on and take the final step toward making the Infinity Ball work as it was always intended to work.
